translations: 市议员，政务委员会委员

sentences.sentence: Several new councillors got in at the last election.
sentences.translation: 几位新政务委员在最近一轮选举中当选。

sentences.sentence: Local councillors have a duty to serve the community.
sentences.translation: 地方议员有义务为社区服务。

sentences.sentence: Several dozen councillors walked out of the meeting in protest.
sentences.translation: 几十位议员中途愤然退出会议，以示抗议。
